features: Fitted bedspread with blue floral pattern
objects.finish: Polished finish on wood and marble
Matte finish on wooden frame, glossy marble

visual_attributes.lighting: Natural light from windows, recessed ceiling lights
visual_attributes.texture: Smooth marble, glossy wood, textured bedspread

indian_context.space_utilization: Efficient use of space with built-in wardrobes and storage under the bed
indian_context.cultural_significance: Marble and wood are traditional materials symbolizing wealth and durability in Indian homes

analysis.description: This bedroom showcases a modern design with traditional Indian elements, featuring marble flooring, tufted bed headboards, and sliding wardrobes. The use of wood and marble highlights northern Indian architectural styles, while modern amenities like sliding wardrobes and ceiling fans provide a contemporary touch. The space is efficiently organized with built-in storage under the bed and a compact bedside table, reflecting a blend of functionality and style.

metadata.budget_indicator: Mid to high, given the use of marble and wood
metadata.indian_specific: Tufted bed headboard, marble flooring, and the use of wood for furniture
